common.error_message:
Looks like the word sets have not yet loaded!
This could be due to a slow internet connection or something blocking files from loading.
common.tutorial_scroll_message: Navigate between tabs by sliding or scrolling horizontally

settings.title: Settings
settings.language_words_desc: Select the language to use for the wordsets.
settings.language_word_flip: Inverts the position of the words

about.title: About
about.desc: {{app_name}} is an open-source application designed to help artists improve their skills by providing them with a diverse set of words to practice with.<0></0><0></0>With its simple interface and customizable settings, {{app_name}} allows artists to quickly and easily generate random sets of words that can be used for a variety of creative exercises.
about.desc_acknowledge: The words used in this project were automatically generated from <0>Kaikki's Dictionaries</0> using a custom tool. For more information, check the <1>project source</1>.

keybinds.title: Keybinds
keybinds.desc_keybinds: You can always use <0>TAB</0> and <0>Shift</0><0>TAB</0> to move around the whole page!
